title: Frequently Asked Questions About PermaFrost NMR
purpose: Comprehensive FAQ for customers, engineers, and technicians

what_is_permafrost_nmr.question: What is PermaFrost NMR?
what_is_permafrost_nmr.answer: PermaFrost NMR (Nucleo Molecular Regenerative) is a patented nanotechnology treatment that restores HVAC/R system efficiency by removing oil contamination from heat exchanger surfaces. It's a one-time treatment that lasts the life of the equipment.

how_does_it_work.question: How does it work?
how_does_it_work.answer: The treatment is injected into the refrigerant circuit while the system runs. Nano-particles displace oil molecules trapped on metal heat exchanger surfaces and create a permanent protective coating that restores thermal conductivity. Full effect is achieved in approximately 300 runtime hours.

is_it_proven.question: Is this technology proven?
is_it_proven.answer: Yes. 254 PE-certified field measurements, 6 independent laboratory validations (UL, FAU, China National Lab A, Major Appliance Mfg A, Major OEM Electronics A, NSF), 5 US Government/Military installations, and 300,000+ deployments across 38 countries over 15+ years.

what_equipment.question: What equipment types can be treated?
what_equipment.answer: All HVAC/R equipment with oil-lubricated compressors: RTUs, chillers, split systems, CRACs, PTACs, mini-splits, VRF systems, refrigeration equipment. Capacity range: 0.2 to 3,125+ tons.

what_refrigerants.question: What refrigerants are compatible?
what_refrigerants.answer: All refrigerant types: R-22, R-410A, R-134A, R-123, R-407C, R-438A, and more. The product is tested compatible with refrigerant Groups I, II, and III per Texas Oiltech Laboratories testing.

what_oils.question: What oil types are compatible?
what_oils.answer: Both mineral and synthetic oils including POE (polyol ester), PAG (polyalkylene glycol), and alkylbenzene. We have specific formulations for each oil type.

how_much_product.question: How much product is needed?
how_much_product.answer: DX systems: 1 ounce per ton of cooling capacity. Chillers: 10% of total oil charge. Treatment is safe within 5% of calculated amount.

how_long_installation.question: How long does installation take?
how_long_installation.answer: Minutes per unit. Product is injected through the refrigerant service port while the system is running. Zero downtime required.

how_much_improvement.question: How much efficiency improvement can I expect?
how_much_improvement.answer: Typical results: 20-30% efficiency improvement (mean: 23.2% across 254 measurements). Results vary based on equipment age, condition, and degree of oil contamination. Older, more degraded equipment often shows larger improvements.

how_long_to_see_results.question: How long until I see results?
how_long_to_see_results.answer: Full effect is achieved in approximately 300 runtime hours as the treatment circulates and coats all heat exchanger surfaces. Some improvement is immediate.

how_long_does_it_last.question: How long does the treatment last?
how_long_does_it_last.answer: Permanent. The treatment creates a lasting bond with metal surfaces. No reapplication is needed for the life of the equipment.

new_equipment.question: Does new equipment benefit from treatment?
new_equipment.answer: Yes. New equipment benefits from PREVENTION of future oil contamination. Major Appliance Mfg A tested a brand-new Frigidaire unit and measured 47.6% Delta T improvement. Treatment protects efficiency over the equipment's entire life.

how_much_cost.question: How much does it cost?
how_much_cost.answer: $125 per ton of cooling capacity (2025 USD). A 10-ton RTU costs $1,250 to treat. Volume discounts available for orders over 10,000 ounces.

what_is_payback.question: What is the typical payback period?
what_is_payback.answer: 7-16 months for most applications. Large chillers can achieve payback in under 1 month. Data centers and 24/7 operations see faster payback due to high runtime hours.

what_is_roi.question: What ROI can I expect?
what_is_roi.answer: Typical 5-year ROI: 400-600%. Documented examples: Major Bank B 547%, Major Global Bank A 584%. First-year ROI often exceeds 100%.

financing_options.question: Are there financing options?
financing_options.answer: Yes. Standard payment (90 days), installment plans (12-24 months), and shared savings programs (ThEOS - no upfront cost, 50/50 sharing of savings for 4 years).

damage_risk.question: Can this damage my equipment?
damage_risk.answer: No. 300,000+ deployments across 38 countries with ZERO damage claims ever filed. We carry $2M insurance per machine from a Fortune 500 carrier.

warranty_void.question: Will this void my equipment warranty?
warranty_void.answer: No. The treatment does not void OEM warranties. It uses the same oil-compatible base as standard refrigeration lubricants.

is_it_safe.question: Is the product safe to handle?
is_it_safe.answer: Yes. Non-toxic, non-flammable. Use the same precautions as handling refrigeration oil. Safety glasses recommended if contact is likely. Full SDS available.

who_installs.question: Who can install the product?
who_installs.answer: HVAC-certified technicians. Installation is straightforward: inject through refrigerant service port while system operates. Training available from Powertron Global.

downtime_required.question: Is equipment downtime required?
downtime_required.answer: No. Product is injected while the system is running. Zero downtime, zero interruption to cooling.

formulation_selection.question: How do I select the right formulation?
formulation_selection.answer: Oil type determines formulation - NOT refrigerant type. Verify whether your system uses mineral or synthetic oil, then select the matching PermaFrost NMR formulation (DX Mineral, DX Synthetic, Chiller Mineral, or Chiller Synthetic).
